text:
Local Government Order 2002

I make the following order under section 137 of the Local Government Act 1993 .

26 March 2002

J. A. Bacon

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order 2002 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to council
    The land situated at 47 High Street Mathinna in Tasmania and contained in a folio of the Register, within the meaning of the Land Titles Act 1980 , and shown in Certificate of Title, Volume 233456 Folio 3 is transferred to the Break O'Day Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 April 2002

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
